metadata.title: CVE-2022-24834 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: Redis is an in-memory database that persists on disk. A specially craftedLua script executing in Redis can trigger a heap overflow in the cjsonlibrary, and result with heap corruption and potentially remote codeexecution. The problem exists in all versions of Redis with Lua scriptingsupport, starting from 2.6, and affects only authenticated and authorizedusers. The problem is fixed in versions 7.0.12, 6.2.13, and 6.0.20.

criterions.comment: redis package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
